name: R5-ProductShelfLife-R4-ProductShelfLife
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ProductShelfLife into FHIR R4

element.display: The shelf-life and storage information for a medicinal product item or container can be described using this class

target.display: The shelf-life and storage information for a medicinal product item or container can be described using this class
target.comment: R5 `ProductShelfLife` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ProductShelfLife`
R5 `ProductShelfLife.extension` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ProductShelfLife.extension`
R5 `ProductShelfLife.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ProductShelfLife.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `ProductShelfLife.modifierExtension` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ProductShelfLife.modifierExtension`

element.display: The shelf life time period can be specified using a numerical value for the period of time and its unit of time measurement The unit of measurement shall be specified in accordance with ISO 11240 and the resulting terminology The symbol and the symbol identifier shall be used
Special precautions for storage, if any, can be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified

target.display: Special precautions for storage, if any, can be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
target.comment: R5 `ProductShelfLife.specialPrecautionsForStorage` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ProductShelfLife.specialPrecautionsForStorage`

element.display: This describes the shelf life, taking into account various scenarios such as shelf life of the packaged Medicinal Product itself, shelf life after transformation where necessary and shelf life after the first opening of a bottle, etc. The shelf life type shall be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified

target.display: This describes the shelf life, taking into account various scenarios such as shelf life of the packaged Medicinal Product itself, shelf life after transformation where necessary and shelf life after the first opening of a bottle, etc. The shelf life type shall be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
target.comment: R5 `ProductShelfLife.type` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `ProductShelfLife.type` - type made the element mandatory; type increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1
